name: MPD-Distribution
body:
# Module 4
## The Commissioning of Messianic Community

*Version 1.0 â€” Readers' Release*

These files contain a draft of the textbook resource, *The Commissioning of the Messianic Community*, the fourth module of the Maize Plant Discipleship Syllabus, a teaching and training resource, designed in collaboration with Africans, for use in African contexts.

## Accessing the Draft

Access the Reader's Draft by downloading one of the folders on this page. Unzip it and view README file. Readers may then follow the *Readers* link, for further information on reading and reviewing the resources.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
